ygData.subject: Re: [eqbards] Dueling?
ygData.msgSnippet: Hi Slyde, sorry I missed you in POG on Saturday. I needed some help convincing everyone to move further North and go after wisps :). At 55 you get Bombastic
ygData.messageBody:
Hi Slyde, sorry I missed you in POG on Saturday. I needed some help
convincing everyone to move further North and go after wisps :).

At 55 you get Bombastic Bellow which is supposed to stun. Anyone have
experience using this? Does is use manna? Does is have a long recharge? Is
it resisted easily since there's a DD component?

Thanks,
Tzeetch

--- Bill Mann <dabard@...> wrote:

<HR>
<html><body>
<tt>
Charm the pet, make it kill the owner unless they kill it first 
*eg*<BR>
Barring that, stun, stun, stun (and high MR to avoid Fear)<BR>
<BR>
-=B=-<BR>
48th<BR>
The Rathe<BR>
----- Original Message -----<BR>
From: "Daniel Sniderman" <fuzzbone@...><BR>
To: "EQ Bards" <eqbards@yahoogroups.com><BR>
Sent: Monday, April 16, 2001 11:03 AM<BR>
Subject: [eqbards] Dueling?<BR>
<BR>
<BR>
> My small 12-member guild is merging with a much larger guild (after
merger<BR>
> and a bunch of new recruits should be close to 80) that likes to
have<BR>
guild<BR>
> events with a lot of Dueling.  I've never done this before.<BR>
><BR>
> Saturday we had 3 6-man groups duel.  Guessing my way through
this - I<BR>
> twisted Elemental and Guardian - to keep our team from getting Nukes
etc<BR>
to<BR>
> land on us - and Selos - running around in circles to prevent the
tanks<BR>
from<BR>
> landing blows on me.  This was VERY successful.  A ranger
gave up trying<BR>
to<BR>
> chase me and peppered me with arrows - but it didn't really do all
that<BR>
much<BR>
> damage.  I would also run into a fracas where there were pets
pounding on<BR>
a<BR>
> teammate of mine and would fire off screech.<BR>
><BR>
> This got our group to be in a very good shape for the end-game - but
then<BR>
I<BR>
> wasn't in a good spot for that - as there wasn't much casting going
on.  A<BR>
> Necro was hiding in bones form in a firepot medding while her pet
was<BR>
> fighting someone.  I decided to try to go after the necro and
tank her -<BR>
but<BR>
> she was good at fearing me - and while I tried to screech her pet - I
got<BR>
> some resists.  Her pet ultimately killed me - with a remaining
tank (from<BR>
> the other team helping out).<BR>
><BR>
> Anywho, I'm curious of advice from other Bards who may be more
experienced<BR>
> at this as far as good tactics for duels.<BR>
><BR>
> Slyde Katzenjammer<BR>
> 54 Bard<BR>
><BR>
><BR>
> Please send submissions for the eqbards newsletter to
lol@...<BR>
with the subject submissions.<BR>
><BR>
> Your use of Yahoo! Groups is subject to <a
href="http://docs.yahoo.com/info/terms/">http://docs.yahoo.com/info/terms/</a><BR>
><BR>
><BR>
><BR>
<BR>
</tt>

<br>
